title: Scholarship
content: When will the scholarship money be sent to the Accs? How was it for the seniors?

comments.body: No one knows man. Can yall spamming this subreddit with the same questions every day ðŸ˜­you'll get your money when you get it.

The scholarship amount was credited to my acc just now

Your question or post has been answered previously. Before making a new post, always remember to search the subreddit. Duplicate posts will entail deletion.
